MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Santa's morning is early.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Udon-chan～!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Goshujin～!
I'm here.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Shibuya anego～!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes yes yees～!
You only have to say 'yes' once. Anyway - it looks like we're all here.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Of course, Goshujin! Shibuya-san is a baddie punk, so I fully approve of the evil shady corporate customs of no tardiness and no absence! I will work until I die without ever complaining, even if I don't get paid!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's what I'm talk about～, Anego! A good girl instead of a baddie on the contrary...!
Enough of the chatter. You've got plenty of work to do today, don't you?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Of course! Today I'm going to be like Santa and hand out presents to all the good kids in the country～!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Anego! I just have a question!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes? What is it, Udon-chan!? I've just been scolded for wasting my time talking, but Shibuya is a bad girl and will repeat the same mistakes!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's what I'm talk about, Anego～♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Eh um? Oh～, I forgot what I want to ask of you～♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Don't worry! Just take your time and remember! There's no need to rush, Shibuya-san is good at waiting!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: So sweet♪ Ummm, uuhh...?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh, I remember now～! Shibuya Anego is a bad girl, but is it okay for you to do good things like give gifts to everyone?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But of course! Shibuya is Santa-san, right?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Speaking of Santa-san! He trespasses into houses all over the place without permission, leaves presents under children's pillows and leaves, a trespasser!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: To be honest, is such a suspicious person a good kid? Is he a baddie?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ah! H-he's a baddie...!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Right? That's why it's okay, UNDERSTAND?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Understaaand～♪
I'm glad you two are getting on so well. But I really hope you girls hurry up, both of you.
The extreme weather has caused heavy snowfalls all over the world and logistics have almost come to a standstill. In some countries, politics are paralysed and the situation is quite dire.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's right～ My country, Flamarine, is usually warm, and everyone is fall down in flurry because they can't stand the cold～

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: What the heck is this～ this heavy snow... I asked Chitose obaa-san, who has lived a long time about this, and she said she's never seen anything like this in her life.
Naturally, governments all over the world and we of the SSS are doing the utmost to investigate the cause. But while there is no solution in sight, people still have to make a living.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Woosh! It's Shibuya-san's role to protect those lives!
That's right. Of course, I'm the one running the Mist Train at full capacity, delivering supplies to the whole world.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Shibuya-san and the others also act as delivery companies, delivering supplies to places where the tracks don't run! And with only one Train, we wouldn't be able to handle them all!
That's very true. If we keep the Train running continuously, we get tired and in the worst case scenario, we die. That's why we've been given the last few days off.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: So you're going to work for our company even though you're on holiday...? That's my goshujin, you're really cool! Too much of a corporate livestock!
In the midst of a global crisis, I can't just lie around quietly.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Cool～, Sir [Conductor] is so great～♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Udon-chan is great too! This is how you work ya!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ehehe, thank you very much～♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Otto! Goshujin will get mad at me again if I'm chatting with you! Let's hurry up and finish our departure prep, we're especially busy today!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Tomorrow is Kurisumasu! We have to deliver gifts to all the good children in the world today, don't we?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Exactly! In fact, we're in a difficult situation right now - But that's when we should do something wonderful to make everyone feel happy!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's what I'm talk about～, Anego! Even though everyone look so gloomy! You're a baddie who doesn't read the room...!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's what I mean! You're starting to understand, the punk style!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ehehe～♪
Come to think of it, the relationship of you two is also a mystery. You're both from different countries - I didn't get the impression that you were particularly close before.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hmm well. Udon-chan was hired a few days ago as a part-timer at this delivery company run by my Otou-san.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Shibuya-san here was working for this company before that, so I was assigned to train her as a member of the same team. So, well, we became friends in a normal way.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes, thank you very much for your help～♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Thanks to Udon-chan, we can make groundbreaking deliveries, so it's good! It's like a win-win situation!
Groundbreaking delivery...?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Now now, the snowmobile is ready! Everybody get into position!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Rajah～!
Shibuya urged me to get into the snowmobile with her. At the rear of the snowmobile was a container with a generous amount of cargo attached to it.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Udoooon～! Santa II, all ready!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Santa I is ready too!
So I am Santa III? I'm ready too.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shibuya
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes, sir! Now let's go, YO～SOROOO～!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Udon Thani
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: DES NANOOOOOOO～......☆
Right at the moment Udon Thani sat on top of the snowmobile and shouted happily, we were lifted into the air by the huge container.
